titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3605) to amend the Public Health Service Act, the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to protect consumers in managed care plans and other health coverage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Ganske. Petition No: 105-7.

bill.summary: 6/23/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3605 (consumer protection in managed care plans and other health coverage).
